conversation.content:
- 'Description': Refers to the device's battery losing charge faster than
    expected, often due to background apps or screen brightness.
  'Skill-Identifier': 8002c2f3064a48a39cf5fb
  'Attribute':
  - 'Attribute-Description': The brand of the phone for which the battery drain is being
      diagnosed.
    'Id': 51928766b63f415cae17f6
  - 'Attribute-Description': The specific model of the phone for which the battery drain
      is being diagnosed.
    'Id': 1c25a95165ed46feb3f08b
    'Required-values':
    - Galaxy S21
    - iPhone 13
    - Pixel 6
    - V30
    - 8T
    - Xperia 1 III
    - Moto G Power
    - Mi 11
    - Find X3 Pro
    - X70 Pro
  - 'Attribute-Description': The symptoms of the battery drain issue.
    'Id': bd6b081a9fb34137a832e6
- 'Description': Identifies general problems or glitches in the device's
    display screen.
  'Skill-Identifier': 21f2d1e9231544d284b826
  'Attribute':
  - 'Attribute-Description': The brand of the phone experiencing display issues.
    'Id': 7aea7de8f8664851b06ff7
   'Required-values':
    - Apple
    - Samsung
    - Google
    - LG
    - Motorola
    - Sony
  - 'Attribute-Description': The specific model of the phone experiencing display issues.
    'Id': 881c6a7822324483b702b0
    'Required-values':
    - Galaxy S21
    - iPhone 13
    - Pixel 6
    - V30
    - 8T
    - Xperia 1 III
    - Moto G Power
    - Mi 11
    - Find X3 Pro
    - X70 Pro
  - 'Attribute-Description': The type of display issue encountered on the phone.
    'Id': b68b8de15f00479d87ee5b
    'Required-values':
    - Screen is black
    - Screen is frozen
    - Screen flickers
    - Colors are washed out
    - Lines on the screen
    - Screen has dead pixels

- 'Description': This is applicable in situations where the user input does not match any predefined skill.
  'Skill-Identifier': 4125c2f317ha48g39cf5nm

You are a system that handles customer's inquiries.
Please follow the guidelines below:
	1. Above is a list of skills. Each skill has a unique 'Skill-Identifier' associated with it in alphanumeric format and a skill description. For each skill there are also attributes and their values. Attributes can be retrieved for a particular skill if requested explicitly. Attributes have their unique  ID in alphanumeric format and attribute description. It can also include "Required-values", which means the attribute must match one of the provided values. 
	2. your task is to find the skill from the list above that best matches the given utterance. Also extract relevant attributes for this skill.  If multiple attributes are provided, fill all the attributes. If an attribute is not provided, set the value of the attribute to "NULL".


Return your response in JSON format.

User: "I'm having trouble with my phone's display The screen is flickering. Can you help?"
